"'Bodies'" is a song by American alternative metal band Drowning Pool and the
lead single from their debut album [[Sinner (Drowning Pool album)|Sinner]].
Released in May 2001, the song is Drowning Pool's most popular single and has
been featured in various films, TV programs, and advertising since its release.
The song remained Drowning Pool's highest charting single until "37 Stitches"
premiered in fall of 2008. It was also the pay per view theme song for
SummerSlam in 2001, as well of ECW brand in 2006 to early 2008 and its
exclusive PPV.
